actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential water resource development.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of including the North Dakota rural domestic water supply system as a unit of the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential water resource development.
